author: svick
body:
The repo website link https://microsoft.com/PowerShell for some reason redirects to https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/msdn10/mt173057(v=msdn.10). That seems to be some kind of horrible, outdated, badly formatted page with no working links:

![](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/287848/93212699-3a4a6b00-f763-11ea-8ff3-1920eaad32e6.png)
![](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/287848/93212718-40404c00-f763-11ea-82dd-0f9b53d690ff.png)


Can this be fixed?

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: /cc @SteveL-MSFT @sdwheeler not sure which end this would best be fixed on, but y'all would have a better idea than me, I'm sure. 🙂

title: Repo website links to a mostly broken page
